basic_information.scholarship_name: Carlita Walters Endowed Scholarship in Business
basic_information.committee_name: COB - College of Business Scholarship Committee

description: This scholarship was created in memory of Carlita Walters by her son John Paul Walters, Jr. to support a Professional Selling or Real Estate student. Eligibility Requirements Complete application and attach official transcript Preference given to a student with a declared major in Professional Selling or Real Estate Minimum 2.75 GPA Recommendation by faculty member

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_Enrolled_Status is Full Time   or SIS_Enrolled_Status is Part Time
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Enrolled_Status is Full Time   or SIS_Enrolled_Status is Part Time

criteria.description: GEN_Major is Finance-Real Estate   or GEN_Major is Business Administration   or GEN_Major is Busn Admin-Business Admin   or GEN_Major is Busn Admin-Gen Business   or GEN_Major is Busn Admin-General Business   or GEN_Major is Finance   or GEN_Major is Marketing   or GEN_Major is Marketing-Professional Selling   or GEN_Major is Bus Admin-Sales Leadership
criteria.raw_text: GEN_Major is Finance-Real Estate   or GEN_Major is Business Administration   or GEN_Major is Busn Admin-Business Admin   or GEN_Major is Busn Admin-Gen Business   or GEN_Major is Busn Admin-General Business   or GEN_Major is Finance   or GEN_Major is Marketing   or GEN_Major is Marketing-Professional Selling   or GEN_Major is Bus Admin-Sales Leadership

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Mrktg-Professional Selling   and SIS_Major_2 is Marketing-Professional Selling
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Mrktg-Professional Selling   and SIS_Major_2 is Marketing-Professional Selling

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2_2 is Mrktg-Professional Selling   and SIS_Major_2_2 is Marketing-Professional Selling
